cards.name: Ark Angel HM
cards.description:
If Ark Angel HM deals damage to your opponent, double the damage instead.
When Ark Angel HM attacks, Ark Angel HM gains +3000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Red Mage
cards.description: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Fire Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains Haste and Brave.

cards.name: Ifrit
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Fire Backup you control.

cards.name: Iroha
cards.description:
If a Fire Character you control deals damage to a Forward, the damage increases by 1000 instead.
(Dull): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.

cards.name: Edgar
cards.description: (Dull): Choose 1 Category VI Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Cloud
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Cloud enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage and 1000 more damage for each point of damage you have received.
When Cloud is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove the top 10 cards of your deck from the game. If you do so, return Cloud to the field dull.

cards.name: Black Mage
cards.description: (2 Fire, Dull): put Black Mage into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Fire Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Golem
cards.description:
When Golem enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.
Put Golem into the Break Zone: Choose 1 attacking Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Samurai
cards.description:
If you have received 3 points of damage or more, Samurai gains Brave.
If you have received 5 points of damage or more, Samurai gains +1000 power.

cards.name: Amarant
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Amarant enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions.
"Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 7000 damage."
"Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it."

cards.name: Cid (FFL)
cards.description: When Cid (FFL) enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. If you control 5 or more Fire Backups, deal it 8000 damage instead.

cards.name: Zenos
cards.description:
If your opponent controls any Job Warrior of Light Forwards, Zenos gains +2000 power, Haste and Brave.
When Zenos deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 5000 damage.

cards.name: Warrior
cards.description: (1 Fire): If Warrior deals damage to a Forward this turn, the damage increases by 2000 instead.

cards.name: Duncan
cards.description:
You may use Duncan's special ability by discarding a Card Name Sabin instead of discarding a Card Name Duncan as part of the cost.
When Duncan enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage.
Phantom Rush [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it damage equal to Duncan's power.

cards.name: Bahamut
cards.description:
You can only pay with CP produced by Backups to cast Bahamut.
Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. If it is put from the field into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead.

cards.name: Vivi
cards.description: When Vivi enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control 4 or more Category IX Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead. If you control 7 or more Category IX Characters, deal it 10000 damage instead.

cards.name: Brynhildr
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

cards.name: Marche
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Marche enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Fire Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Sabin
cards.description: When Sabin attacks, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control Card Name Edgar, deal it 4000 damage instead.

cards.name: Yotsuyu
cards.description: (1 Fire, Dull): Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less. It cannot block this turn.

cards.name: Rain
cards.description: When Rain enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay (1 Fire). If you do so, deal it 3000 damage.

cards.name: Lava Spider
cards.description: The attacking Forwards you control gain +3000 power.

cards.name: Ark Angel GK
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Ark Angel GK enters the field, Freeze all the Forwards opponent controls.

cards.name: Umaro
cards.description:
Umaro must attack once per turn if possible.
When Umaro attacks, if you don't pay (1 Ice), discard 1 card from your hand.

cards.name: Imperop
cards.description:
When Imperio enters the field, you may pay (1 Ice). If you do so, search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand.
When Imperio is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 Dark Forward and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Garland (IX)
cards.description:
At the beginning of your opponent's Main Phase 1, your opponent selects 1 active Character he/she controls and dulls it.
At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, choose 1 Character. You may pay (1 Ice). If you do so, Freeze it.

cards.name: Scholar
cards.description: (Dull): put Scholar into the Break Zone: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Ice card, add it to your hand.

cards.name: The Mask
cards.description: When The Mask enters the field, you may search for 1 Category FFL Forward and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Bard
cards.description: (Dull):  put Bard into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.

cards.name: Black Mage
cards.description: (2 Ice, 3 CP, Dull): put Black Mage into the Break Zone: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

cards.name: Cocytus
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Cocytus enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards. If you control 4 or more Ice Characters, Freeze them.
When Cocytus enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

cards.name: Shiva
cards.description:
You can only cast Shiva during your turn.
Choose up to 3 Forwards or Monsters opponent controls. Dull them and Freeze them.

cards.name: Shiva
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 5000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Ice Backup you control.

cards.name: Scale Toad
cards.description: At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has 2 cards or more in his/her hand, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

cards.name: Squall
cards.description:
When Squall enters the field, if your opponent controls any dull Forwards, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.
(2 Ice, 1 CP): Choose 1 Forward. Dull it. You can only use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.

cards.name: Setzer
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Setzer enters the field, choose 1 Category VI Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Celes
cards.description:
When Celes attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 3 or more Category VI Characters, dull it.
When Celes deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Freeze it.

cards.name: Sophia
cards.description: (Dull): put Sophia into the Break Zone: Dull all the Forwards with Haste, First Strike or Brave opponent controls.

cards.name: Time Mage
cards.description: When Time Mage enters the field, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do so, dull and Freeze all the Forwards of the same cost as the discarded card opponent controls.

cards.name: Mateus, the Corrupt
cards.description: Ex Burst: Your opponent puts 1 attacking Forward he/she controls into the Break Zone.

cards.name: Palom
cards.description:
When Palom enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions.
"Each player discards 1 card from his/her hand."
"Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it."
"Dull all the Backups opponent controls."

cards.name: Dark Fina
cards.description:
When Dark Fina enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, select up to 2 of the 2 following actions instead.
"Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand."
"Cast 1 Summon of cost 7 or less from your hand without paying the cost."

cards.name: Lasswell
cards.description:
When Lasswell enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. If it has received damage this turn, dull it and Freeze it.
(1 Fire): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.
Azure Sky [S] (1 Fire, 1 Ice, Dull): Choose 2 Forwards. Deal 8000 damage to the first Forward and dull and Freeze the other.

cards.name: Lancer Unit
cards.description:
When Lancer Unit enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it or Freeze it.
Put Lancer Unit into the Break Zone: Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

cards.name: Ark Angel MR
cards.description:
Ark Angel MR cannot be blocked by a Forward of power 7000 or more.
(2 Wind): Ark Angel MR cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

cards.name: Alexander
cards.description: Choose 1 Character of cost 4 or more. Break it.

cards.name: Waltrill
cards.description:
When Waltrill enters the field, place up to 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards as were returned to your deck.
(Dull): put Waltrill into the Break Zone: Draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your deck. You can only use this ability if you control Card Name Norschtalen.

cards.name: Warrior of Light
cards.description:
When a Job Standard Unit Forward enters your field, choose up to 2 Backups. Activate them.
When Warrior of Light attacks, all the Job Standard Unit Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Aerith
cards.description:
The Forwards you control don't receive damage that is less than their power. 
If Aerith is dealt damage by a Summon or an ability, reduce the damage by 2000 instead.
When Aerith is put from the field into the Break Zone, activate all the Backups you control.

cards.name: Onion Knight
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Onion Knight enters the field, choose up to 2 Backups you control. If you have received 3 points of damage or more, activate them. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, activate all the Backups you control instead.

cards.name: Garuda
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Wind Character you control.

cards.name: Thief
cards.description: When Thief enters the field, name 1 Element. Your opponent randomly reveals 2 cards from his/her hand. Select 1 card of the same Element as named among them. Your opponent discards this card.

cards.name: Sherlotta
cards.description: If you pay a CP, you may put Sherlotta into the Break Zone to produce 1 CP of any Element. (You can dull Sherlotta to pay the CP.)

cards.name: Cid Highwind
cards.description:
When Cid Highwind enters the field, choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.
Big Brawl [S](Dull): Choose 1 Character opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Selkie
cards.description: When Selkie is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent puts the top 2 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone. If both cards are of the same type, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Deathgaze (IX)
cards.description: When Deathgaze (IX) enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game for as long as Deathgaze (IX) is on the field.

cards.name: Ninja
cards.description: (2 Wind, Dull): put Ninja into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or less. Break it.

cards.name: Norschtalen
cards.description: When Norschtalen enters the field, you may search for 1 Category FFCC Backup and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Basilisk
cards.description:
When Basilisk enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.
Put Basilisk into the Break Zone: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

cards.name: Fina
cards.description:
If you pay the cost to play Fina onto the field, you may pay an extra (3 Wind).
When Fina enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. If you paid the extra cost, select 2 of the 2 following actions instead.
"Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls."
"Activate all the Characters you control."

cards.name: Fina
cards.description:
When Fina enters the field, choose 1 Wind Character you control. Activate it.
When Fina is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Character you control. Activate it.

cards.name: Veriaulde
cards.description: When Veriaulde is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Wind Monster of cost 4 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

cards.name: Matoya
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Matoya enters the field, choose 1 Monster opponent controls. Break it.

cards.name: Yuffie
cards.description:
If you control 3 or more Category VII Characters other than Yuffie, Yuffie gains +2000 power and Haste.
When Yuffie attacks, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

cards.name: Archer
cards.description: (2 Wind, Dull):  put Archer into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage.

cards.name: Chaos, Walker of the Wheel
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. If that Forward is put into the Break Zone, your opponent may play 1 Forward from their hand onto the field.

cards.name: Ark Angel TT
cards.description: When Ark Angel TT enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. At the end of your opponent's next turn, break it.

cards.name: Ardyn
cards.description:
Brave
Ardyn cannot be broken.
At the beginning of your opponent's Attack Phase, your opponent selects 1 Character he/she controls. He/she may put it into the Break Zone. If he/she does so, Ardyn cannot block this turn.

cards.name: Apururu
cards.description:
The cost required to play Apururu onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Backup you control.
When Apururu enters the field, choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Dark Knight
cards.description: (1 Earth, 1 CP, Dull): put Dark Knight into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each point of damage you have received.

cards.name: Undead Princess
cards.description:
When Undead Princess enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay 3 CP, it cannot attack or block this turn.
Put 2 Earth Backups into the Break Zone: Play Undead Princess onto the field dull. You can only use this ability if Undead Princess is in the Break Zone.

cards.name: Ignis
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Ignis enters the field, you may search for 1 Card Name Noctis and add it to your hand.
The Category XV Forwards other than Ignis you control gain +1000 power and Brave.
Overwhelm [S](1 Earth): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage for each Category XV Forward you control.

cards.name: Machinist
cards.description: When Machinist enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Break it.

cards.name: Gladiolus
cards.description:
You can only pay with Earth CP to play Gladiolus onto the field.
If you control Card Name Noctis, the cost for playing Gladiolus onto the field is reduced by 2.
Cyclone [S] (2 Earth, 2 CP, Dull): Deal 7000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

cards.name: Graham
cards.description: When Graham is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you have received 4 points of damage or more, break it.

cards.name: Glaive
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Glaive enters the field, you may search for 1 Card Name Sol or Card Name Diana and add it to your hand.
The Category FFL Forwards other than Glaive you control gain +2000 power.

cards.name: Titan
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each Earth Backup you control.

cards.name: Nacht
cards.description:
If you control a Job Warrior of Darkness other than Nacht, Nacht gains +1000 power and Brave.
(X X): Choose 1 Forward or Monster. If its cost is X, break it. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn.
Ebony Slash [S] (2 Earth): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

cards.name: Noctis
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Noctis enters the field, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 Category XV card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
Warp-strike [S] (1 Earth): Choose 1 Monster. Break it.

cards.name: Luminous Puma
cards.description:
When Luminous Puma enters the field, choose 1 Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.
Put Luminous Puma into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward or Backup in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Fenrir
cards.description:
If you cast Fenrir, you may pay an extra 2 CP.
Choose 1 Light Forward or Dark Forward. Break it. If you paid the extra cost, remove it from the game instead.

cards.name: Prompto
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Prompto enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent controls 4 or more Forwards, remove it from the game.
When Prompto enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.

cards.name: Hecatoncheir
cards.description: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more. Break it.

cards.name: Libroarian
cards.description:
When Libroarian enters the field, remove the top 4 cards of your deck from the game.
At the end of your turn, add 1 card removed by the previous effect to your hand. Then, if there are no more cards removed by the previous effect left, put Libroarian into the Break Zone.

cards.name: Marlene
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Marlene enters the field, choose 1 Card Name Aerith or Card Name Cloud or Card Name Tifa or Card Name Barret in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Moogle Knight
cards.description:
Brave
If Moogle Knight is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 3000 instead.
If a Forward forming a party with Moogle Knight receives damage, reduce the damage by 3000 instead.

cards.name: Monk
cards.description: (Dull): put Monk into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +3000 power and Brave. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

cards.name: Layle
cards.description: (Dull): put Layle into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Summon of cost 4 or less. Cancel its effect.

cards.name: Ark Angel EV
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Ark Angel EV enters the field, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Dull it and deal it 2000 damage.
(5 CP): During this turn, the next damage dealt to Ark Angel EV by a Forward becomes 0 instead.

cards.name: Alisaie
cards.description:
The Card Name Alphinaud you control gains +1000 power.
(Dull): Choose 1 Card Name Alphinaud you control. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Alba
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Alba enters the field, choose as many Forwards opponent controls as the Job Warrior of Darkness you control. Dull them.
If your opponent controls 2 or more dull Forwards, Alba gains Haste and "Alba cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities".

cards.name: Alphinaud
cards.description: When Alphinaud attacks, dull all the Forwards with a power equal or inferior to Alphinaud's opponent controls.

cards.name: Electric Jellyfish
cards.description:
When Electric Jellyfish enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn. 
Put Electric Jellyfish into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

cards.name: Odin
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Break it.

cards.name: Black Mage
cards.description: (2 Lightning, Dull): put Black Mage into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Lightning Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

cards.name: Sakura
cards.description:
When Sakura enters the field, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 8000 damage.
Dull 5 active Lightning Backups: Choose 1 Forward. Break it.

cards.name: Jake
cards.description:
When a Forward other than Jake enters your field, that Forward gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.
(Dull): Choose 1 Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Shango
cards.description: For each Lightning Backup you control, Shango gains +1000 power.

cards.name: Summoner
cards.description: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Lightning Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains Haste and First Strike.

cards.name: Jinnai
cards.description:
Back Attack
First Strike
When Jinnai enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage.

cards.name: Diana
cards.description:
When Diana enters the field, choose 1 Category FFL Forward other than Card Name Diana in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.
(Dull): Choose 1 Category FFL Forward other than Diana you control. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Death Machine
cards.description:
Each turn, at the beginning of Main Phase 1, if neither player controls Forwards, put Death Machine into the Break Zone.
At the end of your turn, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.
At the end of your opponent's turn, select 1 Forward you control. Put it into the Break Zone.

cards.name: Raiden
cards.description:
You can only pay with CP produced by Backups to cast Raiden.
Choose 1 Forward. Break it.

cards.name: Ramuh
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 5000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Lightning Backup you control.

cards.name: Lid
cards.description:
When Lid enters the field, choose 1 Lightning Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.
(Dull, Discard 3 cards): Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

cards.name: Dragoon
cards.description: If you control 3 or more Job Dragoon or Card Name Dragoon, Dragoon gains Haste and First Strike.

cards.name: Dragoon
cards.description: The cost required to play Dragoon onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Job Dragoon or Card Name Dragoon you control (it cannot become 0).

cards.name: Rude
cards.description:
(Dull): Choose 1 Card Name Rufus or Job Member of the Turks you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.
Grand Spark [S] (3 Lightning, 4 CP, Dull): Deal 8000 damage to all the active Forwards. You can only use this ability if you control Card Name Reno.

cards.name: Rufus
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Rufus enters the field, you may search for 1 Job Member of the Turks and add it to your hand.
When Rufus or a Job Member of the Turks you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 5000 damage.

cards.name: Reno
cards.description:
(Dull): put Reno into the Break Zone: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 3000 damage.
Turk Light [S] (Dull): Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

cards.name: Alexander
cards.description:
Select 1 of the 2 following actions. 
""Choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.""
""Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.""

cards.name: Eiko
cards.description:
When Eiko enters the field, you may search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.
When Eiko is put from the field into the Break Zone, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Garnet
cards.description:
Ex Burst: When Garnet enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Activate it.
If a Forward you control is dealt damage by a Summon, reduce the damage by 5000 instead.

cards.name: Quina
cards.description: Remove the top 5 cards of your deck from the game: Until the end of the turn, Quina gains +2000 power and Quina cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. You can only use this ability once per turn.

cards.name: Zidane
cards.description:
If you have 6 or more cards in your hand, Zidane cannot be blocked.
When Zidane deals damage to your opponent, draw 2 cards.
Solution 9 [S] (2 Water): Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it loses 2000 power for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Shamonde P Grauche
cards.description: If a Forward you control receives 1000 damage, the damage becomes 0 instead.

cards.name: White Mage
cards.description: (1 Water, Dull): put White Mage into the Break Zone: Activate all the Forwards you control.

cards.name: Steiner
cards.description:
When Steiner or a Category IX Character enters your field, activate Steiner.
(Dull): Choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 1000 instead.

cards.name: Strago
cards.description: (1 Water, Dull): put Strago into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Card Name Relm of cost 2 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

cards.name: Astrologian
cards.description: (1 Water): Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Water card, Astrologian gains +3000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability once per turn.

cards.name: Paladin
cards.description: (1 Water, Dull): put Paladin into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 other Forward you control. During this turn, the next damage dealt to the former is received by the latter instead.

cards.name: Gramps
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Gramps enters the field, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Nichol
cards.description:
When Nichol enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. They lose 1000 power for each Water Backup you control until the end of the turn.
(1 Water, Dull): All the Water Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Ninja
cards.description: (1 Water, Dull): put Ninja into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Activate it and gain control of it until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Fairy
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Freya
cards.description:
If you control a Job Dragoon or a Card Name Dragoon other than Freya, Freya gains Haste.
When Freya enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 2000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Whale Zombiw
cards.description:
When Whale Zombie enters the field, draw 1 card.
Put Whale Zombie into the Break Zone: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Return these to the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Meltigemini
cards.description: The power of Forwards cannot be increased by Summons or abilities.

cards.name: Lion
cards.description:
If you don't control any Forwards, the cost for playing Lion onto the field is reduced by 1.
When Lion attacks, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

cards.name: Leviathan
cards.description: Ex Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it loses 1000 power for each Water Character you control.

cards.name: Relm
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Relm enters the field, choose 1 Monster. Return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Lunafreya
cards.description:
If you control a Category XV Forward, the cost for playing Lunafreya onto the field is reduced by 1.
During your opponent's turn, when a Forward other than Light and Dark you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may put Lunafreya into the Break Zone. If you do so, play the Forward placed in the Break Zone onto the field dull.

cards.name: Madeen
cards.description:
You can only cast Madeen during your turn.
If you have received 5 points of damage or more, the cost required to cast Madeen is reduced by 2.
Deal 9000 damage to all the Forwards.

cards.name: Rain
cards.description:
When Rain attacks, until the end of the turn, all the Forwards you control gain +2000 power and all the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power.
Leadership [S]: All the Forwards you control gain Haste until the end of the turn.
Undermine [S] (2 CP): All the Forwards opponent controls lose 4000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Ark
cards.description:
You can only cast Ark during your turn.
All the Forwards lose 8000 power until the end of the turn. Draw 1 card for each Forward whose power became 0 or less due to the previous effect.

cards.name: Veritas of the Dark
cards.description:
When Veritas of the Dark enters the field, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls. Put it into the Break Zone. 
When Veritas of the Dark is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent selects 1 Character he/she controls. Put it into the Break Zone.

cards.name: Gosetsu
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Gosetsu enters the field, you may search for 1 Card Name Hien or Card Name Yugiri and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Hien
cards.description:
If you control a Job Samurai other than Hien, Hien gains +1000 power and Brave.
When a Job Samurai Forward you control attacks, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Lyse
cards.description:
You cannot play Lyse or Card Name Yda while already in control of either Character.
The Forwards other than Lyse you control gain +1000 power. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, the Forwards you control gain +2000 power instead.
Dragon Kick [S] (Dull): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

cards.name: Godo
cards.description:
The Card Name Yuffie you control gains +1000 power.
(Dull): Choose 1 attacking Card Name Yuffie you control. It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Yuffie
cards.description: When Yuffie enters the field, you may pay (X CP). If you do so, search for 1 Card Name Red XIII of cost X or less and play it onto the field.

cards.name: Red XIII
cards.description: If you control Card Name Yuffie, Red XIII gains Haste and First Strike.

cards.name: Cloud
cards.description:
When Cloud enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If you control 4 or more Category VII Forwards, break it.
When a Category VII Forward you control blocks, it gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Tifa
cards.description:
If you control a Card Name Cloud Forward, the cost for playing Tifa onto the field is reduced by 2.
Brave
Final Heaven [S] (1 Earth, Dull): Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 10000 damage.

cards.name: Barret
cards.description: Ex Burst: When Barret attacks, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Category VII Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Thancred
cards.description: (Dull): Choose 1 attacking Category XIV Forward you control. It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Fordola
cards.description: When Fordola enters the field, choose 1 Backup you control. You may remove it from the game. If you do so, Fordola gains +1000 power, Haste, First Strike and Brave. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn.)

cards.name: Yugiri
cards.description:
If your opponent doesn't control Forwards, Yugiri gains Haste.
(2 Lightning, 2 CP): Break the Forward that blocks Yugiri.
